title: [Proposal] Incentive System & Deal-flow
body:
# Motivation:
At ShineDAO we believe that maximizing the success of early-stage teams requires more than just capital. The goal of this proposal is to introduce a model that allows teams and communities to engage in new incentivized relationships. 
# Requirements:
Based on community feedback at the workshop held 8th April 2021, we identified the following incentive system requirements:
* All members feel incentivized to purchase SHN so that they can get access to seed-sales and IDOs of incubated projects
* All members feel incentivized to contribute to incubated projects so they can get rewards and higher cap/ person allocations
* All members feel incentivized to bring new projects to ShineDAO to get rewards and higher cap/ person allocation
* Value of SHN keeps increasing with demand for investing in its projects
* Value of SHN keeps increasing if projects are successful in the long run (buyback mechanism)
* Each member can have multiple roles
* Each member feels the system is fair

# Roles:
**Investors:**
Contributors with >10000 SHN will have access to investor's cap/ person (lower) allocation at seed-sale and IDO. At least 50% of the seed-sale and at least 80% of IDO will be reserved for investors allocation.

**Committee:**
Contributors with 300000 SHN will have access to committee cap/ person (higher) allocation at seed-sale and IDO. Up to 50% of the seed-sale and up to 20% of IDO will be reserved for committee allocation. They will have the ability to select and vote on a project for incubation. 

**Contributors:**
Contributors who provide technical and business support to projects will share 40% of the total token allocation to ShineDAO. They will have access to 3x investors cap/ person (lower) at IDO and no ability to invest in seed-sale (since the project did not receive any support yet at that stage).

**Advisors:**
Experts who provide insight and assistance in areas meaningful for the project will share 20% of total token allocation to ShineDAO. They will have access to 2x committee cap/ person (higher) at IDO and no ability to invest in seed-sale (since the project did not receive any support yet at that stage).

**Deal hunter:**
Contributor that introduces new project to the community, receives 5% of total token allocation to ShineDAO if their project gets incubated. It gets access to 2x committee cap/ person (higher) allocation at seed-sale and IDO.

**Teams:**
Early-stage blockchain teams will get seed-sale and IDO capital for their project as well as support from engaged and incentivized community of contributors and advisors. Because community and advisors will help them with finding product-market fit from day 1 of their incubation, they will be able to raise with higher evaluation at IDO while allocating 5%-20% of their total token supply as ShineDAO community reward allocation. 

**Facilitators:**
The core team of ShineDAO responsible for facilitation of the deal flow, and making sure teams have all recurses to make their projects successful.
![](https://i.ibb.co/CW1TvMN/Deals-2x-1.png) 

# Deal-flow:
![](https://i.ibb.co/mBct20J/Deals-2x-2.png) 
# Example reward calculation:
Given that the project is allocating 15% of their token as ShineDAO community reward, and the project reaches $5.000.000 fully diluted market capitalization we are presenting the following example calculation for MVP. 
![](https://i.ibb.co/dKZyWr3/Screenshot-2021-04-13-at-00-13-06.png)
